description: Try our easy to follow Spanish Eggs with Chorizo, Potato & Tomato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baked eggs,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg,Low sugar,Halal,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Low fat,Spinach
name: Spanish Eggs with Chorizo, Potato & Tomato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Heat oil in a heavy-based frying pan over medium heat. Add chorizo, potato and onion. Stir until combined.
Cook for 8 minutes or until vegetables are just tender. Add cumin, coriander and paprika. Stir and cook for 1 minute. Pour tomatoes over mixture and bring to the boil.
Roughly chop half the coriander and stir into tomato mixture. Form 4 indentations in tomato mixture with the back of a spoon. Crack an egg into each indent.
Cover pan with a tight fitting lid or foil. Place in oven for 15 minutes. Remove cover and cook for 5 minutes or until egg white is just cooked.
Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with remaining coriander leaves. Serve.
